revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Jetson TX2 Developer Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/jetson-tx2-developer-kit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = yes |submodel = TX2 DevKit |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = P2597 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VOB-P3310 |icid = 7361A-P3310 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;Tegra X2;Parker, Jetson Tegra X2, (TE770D-A2); |cpu1_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Denver 2<!-- 2X ARM Denver 2 @2GHz 4x ARM (Cortex-A57) @2GHz --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDINBDG4-32G-I; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBPUMLHR-NME; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM89610; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:4B |oui = 00:04:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.140;Ubuntu 18.04;
|exp_if_types = PCIe x4, Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.74 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J7
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI 2.0, EDP, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, I2C, I2S, SPI, Camera 5MP, GPIO, CAN, fan, heatsink, |addchip = I2C Bus Repeater;NXP;PCA9515;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C and SMBus Expander;TI;TCA9539;;2;,,, 4.5-28V, 25A Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS53015;;2;,,, 5V, 3A, 1MHz Synchronous Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW8805;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5932A;;1;,,, 30V, 20A P-Channel Trench MOSFET;MagnaChip;MDV3604;;3;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17506Q5A;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXB0108;2;,,, Triple-Channel High-Side Measurement Shunt & Bus Voltage Monitor;TI;INA3221;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = nvidia |defaultpass = nvidia |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/19/2017 |estreldate = 03/2017 |estprice = 599 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAE8DACE1676 |asin = B06XPFH939 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[nVIDIA]] ''Jetson Tegra X2'' (TE770D-A2) :2X [[ARM]] Denver 2 @2GHz :4x [[ARM]] (Cortex-A57) @2GHz *GPU: 256 ''Pascal'' 4Kp60 HEVC/H.265, H.264, VP9, VP8 *Storage: 32GB eMMC flash, SD Card slot, SATA port *RAM: 8GB (LPDDR4) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 Type-A, 1x Micro USB 2.0 (OTG) *Power Source: 19V/4.74A DC via power jack
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Jetson_TX2 ''Jetson TX2'' on '''eLinux'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/03/08/nvidia-introduces-jetson-tx2-embedded-artificial-intelligence-computer/ ''NVIDIA Introduces Jetson TX2 Embedded Artificial Intelligence Computer'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/nvidias-new-jetson-tx2-module-runs-linux-on-tegra-parker-soc/ ''Nvidia’s new Jetson TX2 module runs Linux on Tegra Parker'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
